title: Team object in GraphQL disclosed of private programs via the industry

profile.name: HackerOne
profile.about: Vulnerability disclosure should be safe, transparent, and rewarding.

vulnerability_information:
**Summary:**
Disclosure of private programs across the industry


If the program is private, it will show industriy


### Steps To Reproduce
{"query": "query {team(handle:\\"█████████\\"){_id,industry}}"}

`{"data":{"team":{"_id":"█████████","industry":"Computer Hardware \u0026 Peripherals"}}}`

{"query": "query {team(handle:\\"█████████\\"){_id,industry}}"}

`{"data":{"team":{"_id":"████████","industry":"Computer Software"}}}`

{"query": "query {team(handle:\\"███\\"){_id,industry}}"}

`{"data":{"team":{"_id":"████","industry":null}}}`

## Impact

Disclosure of private programs
vulnerability_information_html:
Summary:
Disclosure of private programs across the industry

If the program is private, it will show industriy

Steps To Reproduce

{"query": "query {team(handle:\"█████████\"){_id,industry}}"}

{"data":{"team":{"_id":"█████████","industry":"Computer Hardware \u0026 Peripherals"}}}

{"query": "query {team(handle:\"█████████\"){_id,industry}}"}

{"data":{"team":{"_id":"████████","industry":"Computer Software"}}}

{"query": "query {team(handle:\"███\"){_id,industry}}"}

{"data":{"team":{"_id":"████","industry":null}}}

Impact

Disclosure of private programs

activities.message:
Hi @antenna -- These reports will help you understand me.

 #343464
@HackerOne says me :
`Hi @haxta4ok00 - thanks again for pointing out this security vulnerability. We've determined that the severity of this vulnerability is medium, which is why we're rewarding you with a $2,500 bounty. Even though the data itself isn't particularly sensitive, this issue can be used to determine whether external programs in our Directory are running private programs. This was a good find, thanks!`

> This does not appear to be an issue, but I've asked the internal team to check as well

activities.markdown_message:
Hi @haxta4ok00,

I could not find any evidence to suggest that either ██████████ or ██████████ have private programs.

This does not appear to be an issue, but I've asked the internal team to check as well

Best regards,
@antenna

activities.message:
Hey @antenna -- thanks for the answer.

>I could not find any evidence to suggest that either █████ or ███ have private programs.

██████ and ████ have parameter industry not `null` => have private part.
███████ have industry `null` => sandboxed program
activities.markdown_message:
Hey @antenna -- thanks for the answer.

I could not find any evidence to suggest that either █████ or ███ have private programs.

██████ and ████ have parameter industry not null => have private part.
███████ have industry null => sandboxed program

activities.message: Hi @haxta4ok00 - thanks for your patience. We were able to reproduce the behavior you describe and escalated it to the squad that'll work on this. We'll get back to you when we have an update!
activities.markdown_message: Hi @haxta4ok00 - thanks for your patience. We were able to reproduce the behavior you describe and escalated it to the squad that'll work on this. We'll get back to you when we have an update!

activities.message: Thanks @haxta4ok00! This was determined to be low severity due to the fact that only a subset of external programs could be identified as private programs using this method.
activities.markdown_message: Thanks @haxta4ok00! This was determined to be low severity due to the fact that only a subset of external programs could be identified as private programs using this method.

activities.message:
Hi @jobert -- Thanks for the answer and bounty!, but why "attack_complexity":"high" To define a program I only need a query, nothing else ? It seems to me that for the attack here is `Low`, give me answer please. Thanks

`Low: Specialized access conditions or extenuating circumstances do not exist. An attacker can expect repeatable success against the vulnerable component.`

There is no need for additional actions
activities.markdown_message:
Hi @jobert -- Thanks for the answer and bounty!, but why "attack_complexity":"high" To define a program I only need a query, nothing else ? It seems to me that for the attack here is Low, give me answer please. Thanks

Low: Specialized access conditions or extenuating circumstances do not exist. An attacker can expect repeatable success against the vulnerable component.

There is no need for additional actions

activities.message: Hi @haxta4ok00 - I went with a high attack complexity because the program needs to have a published External Program for this vulnerability to be exploited. Even then, since this information is also exposed to a small subset of programs that are not launched yet, there is no 100% guarantee that the program is launched. However, that set of programs is so small that we decided to treat this as a security vulnerability.
activities.markdown_message: Hi @haxta4ok00 - I went with a high attack complexity because the program needs to have a published External Program for this vulnerability to be exploited. Even then, since this information is also exposed to a small subset of programs that are not launched yet, there is no 100% guarantee that the program is launched. However, that set of programs is so small that we decided to treat this as a security vulnerability.

activities.message: Hi @jobert -- Thank you for the answer
activities.markdown_message: Hi @jobert -- Thank you for the answer

activities.message: Hi @haxta4ok00 - thanks again for bringing this to our attention. We've updated the ACL for this particular field. Can you verify the fix?
